Title: Lesson 1 Farm Animals
Content: 本单元我们要学习6大类动物:Farm Animals农场动物, Pets宠物, Sea Animals海洋动物, Circus Animals马戏团动物, Forest Animals森林动物和Jungle Animals丛林动物。本节课我们学习81-82课时  Unit 6 Animal Lesson 1 Farm Animals主要学习内容如下:【1】课堂上我们看了一个关于农场动物的小视频,学习五种常见的农场动物:Pig猪, chicks小鸡, chicken鸡, sheep绵羊, cows牛What's this animal?   It's a pig/chick/ chicken/ sheep/cow....【2】引导学生根据动物的叫声及动物的特性判断是哪种动物:Which animal is the biggest animal on the farm? The cow.Which animal makes the sound baa-baa? The sheep.Which animal makes the sound peep-peep? The chicks.Which animal lays eggs? The chicken.Which animal is pink? The pigs.【3】引导学生通过学动物的叫声识记动物, Can you sound like a pig/chick/ chicken/ sheep/cow....           A pig makes the sound oink-oink.    A chick makes the sound peep-peep.      A sheep makes the sound baa-baa.    A cow makes the sound moo-moo.

Title: Lesson 2 Pets 宠物
Content: 本节课我们学习83-84课时 Unit 6 Animals Lesson 2 Pets 宠物。主要学习内容如下:【1】学习8中常见的宠物: turtle 乌龟, bird鸟,hamster 仓鼠, snake 蛇,gold fish金鱼,dog, cat, rabbit    What's this animal? It’s a turtle/bird/hamster/snake/gold fish/dog/cat/rabbit;【2】引导学生通过学动物的叫声识记动物,  Can you show me/act like a dog/cat/...?       Can you sound like a dog?  Yes, woof-woof. 【3】引导学生理解pet的含义。Do you have a pet? My pet is ....本节课学习的动物比较多,孩子们一时还不能全部掌握,我们后面会反复复习的,请您不要着急哦~

Title: Lesson 3 Sea Animals (1)
Content: 本节课我们学习85-86课时 Unit 6 Animals Lesson 3 Sea Animals (1)。海里的动物我们主要学习: seaturtle海龟, fish鱼,crab螃蟹,octopus章鱼,dolphin海豚,shark鲨鱼,whale鲸鱼我们分两节课学习。第一节课我们主要学习内容如下:【1】了解海里面的动物的习性;【2】学习3个海洋动物: sea turtle海龟,fish鱼,crab螃蟹。本节课的重点是简单了解海洋动物的习性,听到海洋动物的发音可以指出相应的动物。下节课我们会重点引导孩子们学习这些动物。

Title: Lesson 4 Sea Animals (2)
Content: 本节课我们学习 87-88课时 Unit 6 Animals Lesson 4 Sea Animals (2)。海里的动物我们主要学习:sea turtle海龟, fish鱼,crab螃蟹,octopus章鱼,dolphin海豚,shark鲨鱼,whale鲸鱼我们分两节课学习。第二节课我们主要学习内容如下:【1】根据海里动物的习性判断是哪一个动物:Which animal has a big shell on his back, a tail and four flippers to swim with? SEATURTLEWhich animal has lots of long arms called tentacles? OCTOPUSWhich animal is the biggest animal and breathes above the water using a blowhole? WHALEWhich animal has a shell on his body for protection, and has two claws and many legs? CRAB Which animal breathes underwater, has fins and comes in many different sizes, shapes and colors? FISHWhich animal is very smart and friendly, and breathes above the water with a blowhole? DOLPHIN【2】学习4个海洋动物: octopus章鱼,dolphin海豚,shark鲨鱼,whale鲸鱼;【3】复习之前学过的sea animals海洋动物。

Title: Lesson 5 Circus Animals + Let’s Move
Content: 本节课我们学习89-90课时 Unit 6 Animals Lesson5 Circus Animals + Let’s Move主要学习内容如下:【1】学习5个马戏团动物:elephant大象,monkey猴子,dog小狗,seal海狮,tiger老虎您可以在家问宝贝儿:What’s this animal? 引导孩子说 It’s an elephant/a monkey/dog/seal/tiger. 【2】课堂上我们学习马戏团动物和他们经常表演的工具,猴子骑车,小狗跳圈,海狮顶球,老虎跳火圈;【3】学习两种跳的动作指令:Jump. 双脚跳 Skip.单脚跳。

Title: Lesson 6 Forest Animals + Let’s Talk
Content: 本节课我们学习93-94课时  Unit 6 Animals  Lesson 6 Forest Animals + Let’s Talk主要学习内容如下:【1】学习5个森林动物:Frog青蛙, bird小鸟, raccoon浣熊, bear熊, fish鱼。What's this animal? It’s a frog/bird/raccoon/bear/fish.【2】课堂上我们看了动物的生活环境,根据动物的习性判断是哪种动物:(1)Which animal is the color green? It’s the FROG. (2)Which animal can fly? It’s the BIRD. (3)Which animal looks it is wearing a mask and has rings on its tail? It’s the RACCOON. (4)Which animal lives in water? It’s the FISH. (5)Which animal is the biggest animal? It’s the BEAR.  【3】引导学生用肢体做出动物的动作Can you show me/act like a frog/bird/bear/fish? 【4】引导学生点数动物Count animals: How many dogs/cats... are there?  There are ... dogs/cats. 【5】Let’s Talk日常交际:Here you are. 给你。Thank you. 谢谢。

Title: Lesson 7 Jungle Animals丛林动物
Content: 本节课我们学习93-94课时  Unit 6 Animals  Lesson 7 Jungle Animals丛林动物主要学习内容如下:【1】学习5种丛林动物: monkey猴子,gorilla猩猩,crocodile鳄鱼, bird鸟,lion狮子。What's this animal? It’s a lion/bird/monkey/gorilla/crocodile.【2】课堂上我们看了动物的生活环境,根据动物的习性判断是哪种动物:(1)Which animal looks like a big cat and has a long mane of fur around his face? It’s the LION. (2)Which animal has wings and a beak? It’s the BIRD.(3)Which animal has a long tail and long arms and can climb trees? It’s the MONKY. (4)Which animal has a long mouth with lots of teeth and likes to swim? It’s the CROCODILE. (5)Which animal is big and black, has long, strong arms and eats lots of leaves and plants?【3】引导学生用肢体做出动物的动作: Can you show me/act like a lion/bird/monkey/gorilla/crocodile?

Title: Lesson 8 The Alphabet + Animals Review
Content: 95-96课时本节课我们学习95-96课时  Unit 6 Animals  Lesson 8 The Alphabet + Animals Review 我们上的是一节复习课,主要学习内容如下:【1】学习Alphabet里MNOP四个字母所代表的单词: M moon月亮 N nest鸟巢 O octopus章鱼 P peach桃子What's this word? It's moon/nest/octopus/peach. What is M/N/O/P for? M is for moon. N is for nest. O is for octopus. P is for peach。【2】复习本单元学过的Farm Animals农场动物, Pets宠物, Sea Animals海洋动物, Circus Animals马戏团动物, Forest Animals森林动物和Jungle Animals丛林动物所有动物;【3】What animal do you like? I like ...
